mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(PEN_ID) AS COUNT FROM PENSION

SELECT P.PEN_ID , P.PEN_NAME , P.PEN_ADDRESS , SUBSTRING_INDEX(A.PEN_IMAGE, '_', -1) AS PEN_IMAGE , COUNT(R.REV_NUMBER) AS RV , (SELECT IFNULL( MIN(CAST(RM_PRICE AS UNSIGNED)) , 0) FROM PENSION_ROOM WHERE PEN_ID = P.PEN_ID) AS RM_PRICE
FROM PENSION P LEFT OUTER JOIN PENSION_ATTACH A ON P.PEN_ID = A.PEN_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN REVIEW R ON A.PEN_ID = R.PEN_ID WHERE 1=1
AND PEN_NAME LIKE '%${pen_name}%'
AND PEN_ADDRESS LIKE '%${pen_address}%'
GROUP BY P.PEN_ID, P.PEN_NAME, A.PEN_IMAGE;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PENSION( PEN_ID, USER_ID, PEN_NAME, PEN_ADDRESS, PEN_ZIPCODE, PEN_NUMBER ) VALUES( #{PEN_ID}, #{USER_ID}, #{PEN_NAME}, #{PEN_ADDRESS}, #{PEN_ZIPCODE}, #{PEN_NUMBER})

INSERT INTO PENSION_ROOM( PEN_ID, RM_NAME, RM_CHECKIN, RM_CHECKOUT, RM_PRICE, RM_RESABLE_NUM, RES_STATUS ) VALUES
(#{item.PEN_ID}, #{item.RM_NAME}, #{item.RM_CHECKIN}, #{item.RM_CHECKOUT}, #{item.RM_PRICE}, #{item.RM_RESABLE_NUM}, #{item.RES_STATUS})
